markdownRemark.html:
I wrote this poem on the plane from Edmonton to Toronto in 2019. At the time I was upset about the concept of â€˜Homeâ€™ and what itÂ means.

What isÂ Home?

Home is where the heart is.
Even if youâ€™re homeless there.

I struggled being homeless
But I had my friends to care.

Iâ€™m on my way home now
But Iâ€™d rather not go

Because home is where the heart is,
And my heart is back home.

My blog is becoming more and more professional, hopefully I can always post my more artsy expressions.
